data.Name: Beyond The Wizards Sleeve
data.Bio: Beyond The Wizards Sleeve are Richard Norris and London DJ-cum-producer Erol Alkan. Under this pseudonym the duo are best known for their successful remixes of Peter Bjorn & John, Tracey Thorn and Midlake. They released their debut album Beyond The Wizards Sleeve Ark 1 in 2008. Using their skills behind the boards, or magic spells, if you will, they cut-up and paste together old psych and Krautrock tracks, essentially pimpinâ€™ them out. For example Read more on Last.fm
